name: Gates TCKWP249 PowerGrip Premium Timing Belt Component Kit with Water Pump
short_description: Total solution for any application: Includes belts, idler(s), tensioners, tensioner springs, water pump, supporting hardware, detailed installation instructions and Technical Service Bulletins for troublesome applications
Water pumps are designed and built for long lasting, efficient cooling
Hydraulic tensioners included, where needed
Everything you need to do the job right, all in one box
product_description: Gates Timing Belt Component Kits with Water Pump oﬀer customers the best and most complete repair solution by including the same premium components as our TCK’s - timing belts, pulleys and tensioners - as well as a water pump. Timing belt driven water pumps should always be replaced at the same time as the timing belt. Don't take chances. With Gates TCKWP’s, you can avoid returns by replacing all critical system components at the same time.
product_details: Model ‎PowerGrip Premium Timing Belt Component Kit with Water Pump

short_description: [Vehicle Fitment]: ①Compatible with Honda Accord 2003-2007 3.0L | 2008-2017 3.5L, Accord Crosstour 3.5L, Crosstour 3.5L, Odyssey 2005-2017 3.5L, Pilot 2005-2015 3.5L, Ridgeline 2006-2014 3.5L; ②fits for Acura MDX 2003-2006 3.5L | 2007-2013 3.7L, RDX 2013-2018 3.5L, RL 2005-2008 3.5L | 2009-2012 3.7L, TL 2004-2008 3.2L | 2007-2014 3.5L | 2009-2014 3.7L; ③fits for Saturn Vue 2004-2007 3.5L --- [It fits the model for SOHC Engine]
[Kit Parts Included]: ①Timing Belt, Sperpentine Belt (or Drive Belt); ②Water Pump with Gasket; ③Tensioner Pully; ④Idler Pulley; ⑤Hydraulic Tensioner; ⑥2x Camshaft Seal; ⑦1x Crankshaft Seal

[Benefits]: The A-Premium Timing Belt Kit with Water Pump are manufactured to OEM specification and are ideal replacement for the original cars. Especially our timing belt, made of excellent HNBR material, has excellent heat resistance, better chemical corrosion resistance and superior wear resistance. All these benefits effectively optimise the engine's performance and ensure your car run smoothly and properly.

[Customer Support]: 1 Year Unlimited-mileage Quality Guarantee; With brand-new and being sturdy. A-Premium timing belt kits are rigorously tested and inspected to meet or exceed OEM standards, ensuring stable performance and a long lifespan. We extremely value your satisfaction and strive to provide you good shopping experience.
